#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mk make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define ll int
#define lf double
#define M 1000000007
ll ans[30000005+1],pr[30000005+1],fp[30000005+1];
void sieve()
{
        ll i,j;
        
        for(i=2;i*i<=30000005;i++)
        {
                if(fp[i]==0)
                {
                        fp[i]=i;
                        for(j=2;i*j<=30000005;j++)
                        {
                              if(fp[i*j]==0)
                              fp[i*j]=i;  
                        }
                }
        }
        for(;i<=30000005;i++)
        if(fp[i]==0)
        fp[i]=i;
        ans[1]=0;
        ans[2]=1;ans[3]=1;
        for(i=4;i<=30000005;i++)
        ans[i]=ans[i/fp[i]]+1;
        for(i=2;i<=30000005;i++)
        ans[i]=ans[i-1]+ans[i];
}
int main()
{
        ll t,n;
        sieve();
        scanf("%d",&t);
        while(t--)
        {
                scanf("%d",&n);
                printf("%d\n",ans[n]);
        }
}
